script.title: DV360 To Sheets
script.description: Move existing DV360 report into a Sheets tab.
instructions: Specify either report name or report id to move a report.
The most recent valid file will be moved to the sheet.

field.name: report_id
field.description: DV360 report ID given in UI, not needed if name used.

field.name: report_name
field.description: Name of report, not needed if ID used.

field.name: sheet
field.description: Full URL to sheet being written to.

field.name: tab
field.description: Existing tab in sheet to write to.
